subject: fix: improve PWA manifest for better installability
body:
- Add explicit scope and prefer_related_applications fields to manifest
- Change PNG icons to 'any maskable' purpose (combined)
- Remove SVG maskable icon (not well supported)
- Add Content-Type: application/manifest+json header in vercel.json
- Bump service worker cache version to v2 to clear stale caches

https://claude.ai/code/session_01ALNf4Yu8id9JqyPF1mQb3m
title: improve PWA manifest for better installability
